Lyrics:
1 ContributorAll Shall Be LyricsI welcome you to my death
When I become eternity

I have accepted my fate
Delivered myself and kneeled before thee
And now I can finally submit my soul
Release me
Relieve me
Eternal torment now comes to an end

So tell me you won’t
Remember my name
When I’m buried beneath the sulfur
But in the end I hope
I made you proud
We won’t start again

No more remorse
No more regret
Years of self hate
Have now come to an end
Come to an end

So tell me you won’t
Remember my name
When I’m buried beneath the sulfur
But in the end I hope
I made you proud
We won’t start again
